Dating: LATE PERIOD (not before); LATE PERIOD ?; GRAECO-ROMAN PERIOD (not after)
Name: Sarcophagus for a lizard
Description: This badly damaged bronze object is a sarcophagus for a lizard. It is still possible to make out the small cylinder on top of which is a lizard and which has two rings. The piece comes from the É. de Meester de Ravestein collection.
